name: Rolling Dice (nickdevprod)
description:
DOWNLOAD FOR ENHANCED GRAPHICS

Movement and Stat system

In this game only way of movement is rolling. after each roll(to be more specific after 2 seconds when you stop moving) the number on the dice will increase your stats. there are 4 stat types: maxHealth, maxStamina , Damage and jumpHeight. first roll will increase maxHealth, second maxStamina and so on. after 4 roll number on your dice will decrease stats.

Enemies

Enemies are evil hands whose will try to flickyou out of the map. with each wave number of enemies will increase. 10th wave is boss fight so you should try increasing stats before fighting with him.

Keys:

WASD or arrow keys for jump direction 

SPACE for jump

HAVE FUN!
